message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $10,000 is unfortunately below my minimum acceptable price.  I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This reflects the value of the product and leaves room for us to find a mutually agreeable price. Let's see if we can make this work!

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $11,000. I believe this strikes a fair balance between the value of the product and my budget.
